name: Center Shiken Trial: Eigo no Tetsujin
overview: Center Shiken Trial - Eigo no Tetsujin (English Ironman Center Test Trial) is an educational psx game disc. The game is about learning english language and can be used to complete the basic high school english skills. The game features more than 1600 different words and it covers the four areas of language learning: pronuntiation, writing, grammar and reading comprehension. The game is divided into 2 different sections. One is about learning in which the game explains different things divided into lessons about english pronuntiation, grammar, etc. The other part is a test in which the player can put his skills to test answering different questions. Manufacturer's description: English learning software aimed at the completion of the basic skills of high school English. Frequent words about 1600 words From the word book mode of the center test, according to the center test problem collection mode consists of four areas of "pronunciation, writing, grammar, reading comprehension", canvas for proficiency test mode in a production sense in the time limit, ability It is equipped with a report card mode that can measure the learning depth of the results and the school of choice of the test. Features: - First person perspective. - 2D graphics - Cartoon graphics - Educational theme.
